div.h3: Building a Somatic Report: An Example
div.p: This section provides a walk-through of mapping from an example somatic report to FHIR using the structure definitions and guidance defined in this IG. A somatic report focuses on the implications of a patient’s genetics (generally the therapeutic implications of somatic variants). The somatic report is represented as a Genomics Report. The related observations and other resources are referenced by the report. The intention of this page is to provide a “User Guide”, based on a specific report example, highlighting how the defined profiles can be used together to encode important relations in somatic reporting. The JSON representation of this report can be found here.
